result.ga: An féidir leat an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: An féidir leat an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: An féidir leat an fhadhb a réiteachCan you solve the problem?
result.ponchtml: An féidir leat an ḟaḋb a réiteaċCan you solve the problem?

result.eng: We worked together to fix the problem.
result.ga: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteachWe worked together to fix the problem.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid ag obair as láṁa a ċéile ċun an ḟaḋb a réiteaċWe worked together to fix the problem.

result.ga: Caithfidh muid an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: Caithfidh muid an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: Caithfidh muid an fhadhb a réiteachWe must solve the problem.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid an ḟaḋb a réiteaċWe must solve the problem.

result.eng: You must get ready for the exam.
result.ga: Caithfidh tú tú féin a réiteach don scrúdú
result.orig: Caithfidh tú tú féin a réiteach don scrúdú
result.html: Caithfidh tú tú féin a réiteach don scrúdúYou must get ready for the exam.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ tú tú féin a réiteaċ don scrúdúYou must get ready for the exam.

result.eng: The soup doesn't agree with me.
result.html: Ní réitíonn an t-anraith liomThe soup doesn't agree with me.
result.ponchtml: Ní réitíonn an t-anraiṫ liomThe soup doesn't agree with me.

result.eng: He didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.
result.ga: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteachHe didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.
result.ponchtml: Níor ċreid sé a ḟusaċt a ḃí sé an ḟaḋb a réiteaċHe didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.

result.html: Réitigh mé dinnéarI prepared dinner.
result.ponchtml: Réitiġ mé dinnéarI prepared dinner.

result.eng: The noun and the adjective agree in gender.
result.ga: Réitíonn an t-ainmfhocal agus an aidiacht ó thaobh inscne de
result.orig: Réitíonn an t-ainmfhocal agus an aidiacht ó thaobh inscne de
result.html: Réitíonn an t-ainmfhocal agus an aidiacht ó thaobh inscne deThe noun and the adjective agree in gender.
result.ponchtml: Réitíonn an t-ainmḟocal agus an aidiaċt ó ṫaoḃ inscne deThe noun and the adjective agree in gender.

result.ga: Réitíonn muid go maith le chéile
result.orig: Réitíonn muid go maith le chéile
result.html: Réitíonn muid go maith le chéileWe get on well together.
result.ponchtml: Réitíonn muid go maiṫ le ċéileWe get on well together.

result.eng: The problem is solved, thanks to you.
result.ga: Tá an fhadhb réitithe a bhuí leatsa
result.orig: Tá an fhadhb réitithe a bhuí leatsa
result.html: Tá an fhadhb réitithe a bhuí leatsaThe problem is solved, thanks to you.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ḟaḋb réitiṫe a ḃuí leatsaThe problem is solved, thanks to you.

result.eng: I get along well with the other people.
result.ga: Réitím go maith leis na daoine eile
result.orig: Réitím go maith leis na daoine eile
result.html: Réitím go maith leis na daoine eileI get along well with the other people.
result.ponchtml: Réitím go maiṫ leis na daoine eileI get along well with the other people.

result.eng: I don't get along well with the other people.
result.ga: Ní réitím go maith leis na daoine eile
result.orig: Ní réitím go maith leis na daoine eile
result.html: Ní réitím go maith leis na daoine eileI don't get along well with the other people.
result.ponchtml: Ní réitím go maiṫ leis na daoine eileI don't get along well with the other people.

result.eng: Do you need two hours to prepare yourself in the morning?
result.ga: An mbíonn dhá uair a' chloig uait le tú féin a réiteach ar maidin
result.orig: An mbíonn dhá uair a' chloig uait le tú féin a réiteach ar maidin
result.html: An mbíonn dhá uair a' chloig uait le tú féin a réiteach ar maidinDo you need two hours to prepare yourself in the morning?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn ḋá uair a' ċloig uait le tú féin a réiteaċ ar maidinDo you need two hours to prepare yourself in the morning?

result.eng: Do you get on well with her?
result.ga: An réitíonn tú go maith léi
result.orig: An réitíonn tú go maith léi
result.html: An réitíonn tú go maith léiDo you get on well with her?
result.ponchtml: An réitíonn tú go maiṫ léiDo you get on well with her?

result.eng: I get on well with her, for the most part.
result.ga: Réitím go maith léi den chuid is mó
result.orig: Réitím go maith léi den chuid is mó
result.html: Réitím go maith léi den chuid is móI get on well with her, for the most part.
result.ponchtml: Réitím go maiṫ léi den ċuid is móI get on well with her, for the most part.

result.eng: What about your parents? Do you get on well with them?
result.ga: Cad é faoi do thuismitheoirí An réitíonn tú go maith leo siúd
result.orig: Cad é faoi do thuismitheoirí An réitíonn tú go maith leo siúd
result.html: Cad é faoi do thuismitheoirí An réitíonn tú go maith leo siúdWhat about your parents? Do you get on well with them?
result.ponchtml: Cad é faoi do ṫuismiṫeoirí An réitíonn tú go maiṫ leo siúdWhat about your parents? Do you get on well with them?

result.eng: I get on better with my father than with my mother.
result.ga: Réitím níos fearr le m'athair ná le mo mháthair
result.orig: Réitím níos fearr le m'athair ná le mo mháthair
result.html: Réitím níos fearr le m'athair ná le mo mháthairI get on better with my father than with my mother.
result.ponchtml: Réitím níos fearr le m'aṫair ná le mo ṁáṫairI get on better with my father than with my mother.

result.eng: I was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romham
result.orig: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romham
result.html: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romhamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag réitiú do mo ḃainis naċ raiḃ aċ aon lá déag roṁamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
